main event: Multiple unidentified flying objects were reported in South Fork Meadow, California on June 7-29, 1957.
interesting points: Sighting included large white lights, twice the size of stars, traveling up and down the mountains., The observation lasted for 4 to 5 hours., A report also mentioned six light-colored objects moving erratically, resembling cigar or triangular shapes., The sightings were documented by the United States Forest Service., No photographs were included in the documentation.
sighted object: large white lights and six unidentified flying objects
witness description: Unidentified civilians and officers from the United States Forest Service.
